name: Taekwondo Game Global Tournament
description:
Discover the joy of kicking a friend’s butt and prove your worth as a taekwondo fighter in The Taekwondo Game – Global Tournament, the first ever mobile taekwondo game. Based on authentic motion-captured taekwondo movements and Olympic rules, it’s as near the real thing as you can come.

Download and play for free - and let the master teach you how to fight.

GAME FEATURES

- Singleplayer tournament - Road to Rio 2016
- Global Multiplayer
- Simple and intuitive controls
- Motion-captured movements from professional players
- Awesome Taekwondo Suits
- Record fight and share on social media
- Authentic Olympic rules
- Beautiful environments – Iran, Mexico Korea, USA, China, Tanzania, Brazil
- Authentic sound effects from a real dojang
- Officially endorsed by World Taekwondo Federation!
